Title: Money Monster
Writer: Jamie Linden (screenplay), Alan DiFiore (screenplay), Jim Kouf (screenplay), Alan DiFiore (story), Jim Kouf (story)
Actors: Julia Roberts, George Clooney, Jack O'Connell, Caitriona Balfe
Plot: A financial advice show host is taken hostage by a man trying to find out how he lost his money following the financial collapse.

Title: Tulip Fever
Actors: Alicia Vikander, Cara Delevingne, Christoph Waltz, Tom Hollander
Plot: An artist falls for a young married woman while he's commissioned to paint her portrait during the tulip mania of 17th century Amsterdam.

Title: The Lobster
Actors: Colin Farrell, Rachel Weisz, Jessica Barden, Olivia Colman
Plot: In a dystopian near future, single people, according to the laws of The City, are taken to The Hotel, where they are obliged to find a romantic partner in forty-five days or are transformed into beasts and sent off into The Woods.
Country: Ireland, UK, Greece, France, Netherlands, USA

Title: The Silence of the Lambs
Actors: Jodie Foster, Lawrence A. Bonney, Kasi Lemmons, Lawrence T. Wrentz
